name: MAZER (S-Wallace)
description:
Navigate through the mazes to the end by collecting colored charges. These charges will let you pass through a wall of the corresponding color. Thinner walls disappear after passing through them, and flickering walls require you to not have any charges of their color to pass through. Good Luck!

I am open to any suggestions and criticisms.

Give me a vote on the game's Steam Greenlight concept page:

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=757435114&searchtext=
